name: Kurtlar Vadisi: Gladio
summary_text: Iskender Büyük is accused of treachery and coup, and standing trial at constitutional court. This story about "GLADIO Organization" is being told from point of view of a deceived insider, and an ex-Special Forces Lt. Iskender Büyük.

name: Homegrown
summary_text: 3 marijuana farmhands see their boss killed, ending their peaceful existence in NW California. They decide to harvest, process and sell the crop themselves. Crime bosses, corrupt cops, killer pilot, greed etc. ensue.

name: Nicht mein Tag
summary_text: Bank teller Till Reiners' life is torn out of a rut by a series of offbeat coincidences, which ultimately lead him to find himself and realize: His life isn't so bad after all...

name: Neram
summary_text: Can a young man escape from the clutches of a loan shark on time?

name: The Eichmann Show
summary_text: Dramatisation of the team hoping to televise the trial of Adolf Eichmann, an infamous Nazi responsible for the deaths of millions of Jews. It focuses on Leo Hurwitz, a documentary film-maker and Milton Fruchtman, a producer.

name: Celle que vous croyez
summary_text: Claire, a 50-year-old divorced teacher, creates a fake Facebook profile of a 24-year-old woman. She finds a photo of a pretty young blonde and uses it. She has created an entirely fictional character, but why?

name: The Enforcer
summary_text: A crusading district attorney finally gets a chance to prosecute the organizer and boss of Murder Inc.

name: Ayyappanum Koshiyum
summary_text: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

name: Nocturama
summary_text: Some young folks, tired of the society they're living in, plan a bomb attack over Paris before taking shelter for a night in a shopping center.

name: The Tall T
summary_text: An independent former ranch foreman is kidnapped along with an heiress, who is being held for ransom by trio of ruthless outlaws.

name: You Might Be the Killer
summary_text: A camp counselor suffering from blackouts finds himself surrounded by murder victims. He turns to his horror movie enthusiast friend for advice, and to contend with the idea he may be the killer.

name: Baghead
summary_text: 4 "actors" go to a cabin in the woods for the weekend to write a movie script. They talk about a relationship movie or a paper bag over the head movie. It starts with an anonymous baghead and slowly escalates.

name: Mojave
summary_text: A suicidal artist goes into the desert, where he finds his doppelgänger, a homicidal drifter.

name: Hipsters
summary_text: Young people struggle to do things their way in the 1950s.

name: Tortilla Soup
summary_text: A Mexican-American master chef and father to three daughters has lost his taste for food, but not for life.

name: Pola X
summary_text: A young writer becomes intrigued with a mysterious dark-haired woman who claims to be his long-lost sister, starting an unusual relationship with her and prompting a downward spiral involving his domineering mother and lovely fiancée.

name: Sabata
summary_text: A master gunfighter teams up with a banjo-playing drifter and a Mexican tramp to foil the town leaders of Daugherty, Texas, who want to steal $100,000 from their own bank to buy land that the approaching railroad will cross.

name: I Remember You
summary_text: A story about a young man and two women who move into a small abandoned town in Iceland to renovate an old house. Little do they know the town has a dark history.

name: Martin Eden
summary_text: Martin Eden struggles to rise above his destitute, proletarian circumstances through an intense and passionate pursuit of self-education, hoping to achieve a place among the literary elite.

name: Candy Jar
summary_text: Dueling high school debate champs who are at odds on just about everything forge ahead with ambitious plans to get into the colleges of their dreams.

name: Tell Me How I Die
summary_text: A9913 is a new drug improving memory - like being there again. Anna joins 17 others testing it for $2000. Some experience the near future including deaths.

name: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
summary_text: A group of youths aspiring to become professional superheroes, fight in a world full of people with abilities, also known as quirks. Deku and his fellow classmates from Hero Academy face Nine, the strongest villain yet.

name: Camp Takota
summary_text: A story that follows Elise, who after finding her life in shambles is forced to work at her old summer camp, where she reunites with two estranged friends.

name: Jerry Seinfeld: 23 Hours to Kill
summary_text: Comedian Jerry Seinfeld performs at the Beacon Theatre in New York City with his take on everyday life, uncovering comedy in the commonplace.

name: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
summary_text: A master swordsman and former soldier and his hunchbacked assistant hunt vampires.

name: The Crew
summary_text: Four retired mobsters plan one last crime to save their retirement home.

name: The Heavenly Kid
summary_text: A hip guardian angel named Bobby Fantana, who died in a car race in the 60s, reluctantly agrees to watch over a lonely 80s high schooler who needs guidance on how to become cool.

name: Green for Danger
summary_text: After the nurse who declares that a recent surgical death was a murder dies also, an enigmatic Scotland Yard inspector arrives to investigate.

Ram and Janani's three stages of love - their attraction for each other during their school days, their love at college days, and the relationship when they mature, are explored in this romantic tale.

name: Black Water
summary_text: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

name: Maanagaram
summary_text: Four youngsters arrive in a big city and their lives become interlinked.

name: Call Girl
summary_text: A young girl is recruited from the bottom rung of society into a ruthless world where power can get you anything.

name: Trash Humpers
summary_text: Follows the lives of a small group of sociopathic elderly people in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Free Rainer
summary_text: Frustrated, because he is forced to produce bad TV-shows, a manager of a TV-station, enters the station and manipulates the ratings, to initiate a TV-revolution.

name: Number 17
summary_text: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

name: Qi mou miao ji: Wu fu xing
summary_text: Fresh from prison, five friends try to stay crime free but inadvertently find themselves caught in a Triad war.

name: Belladonna of Sadness
summary_text: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.

name: Mark of the Vampire
summary_text: When a nobleman is murdered, a professor of the occult blames vampires; but not all is what it seems.

name: Ima, ai ni yukimasu
summary_text: A young woman returns from the dead to her guilt-ridden husband and son, but she cannot remember them.

name: Nathalie...
summary_text: A rich woman hires an elite prostitute in order to verify her husband's faithfulness. Before long the experiment gets out of control.

name: The Stöned Age
summary_text: Joe and Hubbs are a pair of rockers who are on a quest for 'chicks'. This is the tale of their adventures over one night.

name: The Cement Garden
summary_text: Four children live with their terminally ill mother. After she dies, they try to hold things together. In their isolated house, they begin to deteriorate mentally, whilst they hide their mom's decomposing corpse in a makeshift concrete sarcophagus.

name: Knightriders
summary_text: A medieval reenactment troupe find it increasingly difficult to keep their family-like group together, with pressure from local law enforcement, interest from entertainment agents and a growing sense of delusion from their leader.

name: Nicholas and Alexandra
summary_text: Tsar Nicholas II, the inept last monarch of Russia, insensitive to the needs of his people, is overthrown and exiled to Siberia with his family.

name: The Whistlers
summary_text: Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception.

name: The Forger
summary_text: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.

name: Basket Case 2
summary_text: Duane and his basket-bound mutant brother are taken in by a secret home for wayward freaks with journalists hot on their tail.

name: Melvin and Howard
summary_text: The story of hard-luck Melvin E. Dummar, who claimed to have received a will naming him an heir to the fortune of Howard Hughes.

name: 35 Shots of Rum
summary_text: The relationship between a father and daughter is complicated by the arrival of a handsome young man.

name: Der Knochenmann
summary_text: Private Investigator Brenner is handling a case at the grill-station "Löschenkohl". There he finds - besides some chicken - also other meat...that doesn't belong in a good meal.

name: Not Another Happy Ending
summary_text: When a troubled editor discovers that his only successful author is blocked, he knows that he needs to do something about it.

name: Young Detective Dee: Rise of the Sea Dragon
summary_text: From legendary action director Tsui Hark and the creators of international smash hit Detective Dee - Mystery Of The Phantom Flame comes the captivating tale of Dee Renjie's beginnings in ...                See full summary »

name: Chaotic Ana
summary_text: A countdown, 10, 9, 8, 7... until 0, like in hypnosis, through which Ana proves that she does not live alone.

name: Howling III
summary_text: A female werewolf runs away from her family, and falls in love with a man who works in the movie business, while a sociologist who studies these creatures is looking for proof of their existence.

name: Fitoor
summary_text: Modern adaptation of Charles Dickens' Great Expectations; a poor but talented boy falls in love with a girl from an affluent family.

name: Trailer Park Boys: Don't Legalize It
summary_text: After his latest money-making plan fails, Julian concocts his greatest scheme ever -- which involves doing business with his archenemy, Cyrus.

name: The Reckless Moment
summary_text: After discovering the dead body of her teenage daughter's lover, a housewife takes desperate measures to protect her family from scandal.

name: Chûgoku no chôjin
summary_text: A salaryman and yakuza are each sent by their bosses to a remote Chinese village but discover more then they expected.

name: Zombie 3
summary_text: When a terrorist's body, infected with a stolen chemical, is cremated by the US military, a virus is unintentionally released into the atmosphere over a small island.

name: Clean
summary_text: After she ends up in prison and loses custody of her son, a woman struggles to assimilate outside her former life and remain clean long enough to regain custody of her son.

name: Body and Soul
summary_text: A talented boxer's young career hits difficult terrain when an unethical promoter takes interest in him.

name: Midnight
summary_text: A chorus girl stranded in Paris is set up by a millionaire to break up his wife's affair with another man, while being romantically pursued by a cab driver.

name: Brewster McCloud
summary_text: An introverted loner living in the bowels of the Astrodome plots to develop - with the aid of a mysterious guardian angel - a pair of wings that will help him fly.

name: The Pirate
summary_text: A girl is engaged to the local rich man, but meanwhile she has dreams about the legendary pirate Macoco. A traveling singer falls in love with her and to impress her he poses as the pirate.

name: College
summary_text: To reconcile with his girlfriend, a bookish college student tries to become an athlete.

name: Like Sunday, Like Rain
summary_text: Surrounded by wealth and living with abundant resources in Manhattan, 12-year-old cello prodigy Reggie, lives a solitary life lacking only frequently absent parents and friends. Estranged from family, having slacker boyfriend troubles, and fired from her waitressing job, sometimes musician 23-year-old Eleanor needs a new place to live and a new job.

name: Sanshiro Sugata
summary_text: Sugata, a young man, struggles to learn the nuance and meaning of judo, and in doing so comes to learn something of the meaning of life.

name: Loose Cannons
summary_text: An unconventional cop who doesn't take any bull, is paired up with an amazing detective to capture some powerful criminals but the cop soon realizes that his by the book partner has split personality disorder.

name: The Dark Mirror
summary_text: A man is found murdered, and witnesses are sure about the woman they saw leaving his apartment. However, it becomes apparent that the woman has a twin, and finding out which one is the killer seems impossible.

name: Shadow Conspiracy
summary_text: Bishop, trusted advisor to the president, has shots fired at him when Pachenko comes to him about a traitor in highest level of government. He gets away from the cold blooded assassin twice. Will he find the traitor before getting killed?

name: Borç Harç
summary_text: Murat separates from his girlfriend who made marriage plans. He makes troll news on a television channel. Murat finds himself in a great debt bog. Trying to get rid of this bog, Murat finds...                See full summary »

name: Airbag
summary_text: Mommy's boy Juantxo is engaged. Dragged to the party by his friends Konradin and Paco, he loses his expensive wedding ring inside the body of a prostitute. Mafioso whorehouse owner ...                See full summary »

name: Donkey Skin
summary_text: A fairy godmother helps a princess disguise and flee the kingdom so she won't have to marry the king who happens to be her father.

name: Fires on the Plain
summary_text: In the closing days of WWII remnants of the Japanese army in Leyte are abandoned by their command and face certain starvation.

name: Most Likely to Die
summary_text: A group of former classmates gather for a pre-party at one of their homes the night before their 10-year high school reunion, and one by one, they are brutally slain in a manner befitting each's senior yearbook superlative.

name: Krack
summary_text: Krack is an action film which follows Veera Shankar, a hot headed police sergeant, who forms a vicious rivalry with notorious crime figure, Katari Krishna.

name: The Boys in the Band
summary_text: Tempers fray and true selves are revealed when a heterosexual accidentally intrudes on a homosexual party.

name: Spring Breakdown
summary_text: Three women vacation together at a popular travel destination for college co-eds on spring break.

name: Babylon 5: The River of Souls
summary_text: A group of Soul Hunters come to Babylon 5 demanding the return of something that was stolen from them.

name: Yeh Saali Zindagi
summary_text: Gangsters kidnap the prospective son-in-law of a politician in order to secure the release of an imprisoned gang-member.

name: Drake and Josh Go Hollywood
summary_text: When Drake and Josh accidentally send their little sister Megan on a plane to L.A., they soon find themselves in the middle of a dangerous situation.

name: For Keeps?
summary_text: After she gets pregnant, a teenage girl must decide whether she should keep the baby or not.

name: Beats
summary_text: A reclusive teenage musical prodigy forms an unlikely friendship with a down-on-his-luck high school security guard. United by their mutual love of hiphop, they confront the demons of their past and try to break into Chicago's music scene.

name: Ellie Parker
summary_text: A hilarious comic portrait of a young woman's struggle for integrity, happiness and a Hollywood acting career.

name: The Browning Version
summary_text: Forced to retire from an English public school, an unpopular professor must confront his failure as a teacher and husband.

name: Twitches Too
summary_text: After using their powers to battle the forces of darkness, the sisters settle down to lead normal lives. However, the discovery that their biological father may not be dead, but residing in New York, causes confusion for the pair.

name: Airwolf
summary_text: A scientist who has created a super helicopter has defected to Libya and taken the machine with him. A secretive government agency hires an ex-Vietnam War pilot to go to Libya, steal the chopper and bring it back.

name: Kaappaan
summary_text: A Special Protection Group officer has to identify the threat to the prime minister, who he is protecting, and also the nation.

name: Double Lives
summary_text: Set in the Parisian publishing world, an editor and an author find themselves in over their heads, as they cope with a middle-age crisis, the changing industry and their wives.

name: The White King
summary_text: A 12-year-old boy rebels after a brutal government labels his father a traitor and imprisons him.

name: Crimson Gold
summary_text: An Iranian pizza delivery man sees the worst of corruption and social unbalance in his city and is driven to crime.

name: Septembers of Shiraz
summary_text: Prior to the Iranian revolution it was a place where people of all religions were allowed to flourish. This is the story of a prosperous Jewish family who abandon everything before they are consumed by the passions of revolutionaries.

name: Masked and Anonymous
summary_text: A singer, whose career has gone on a downward spiral, is forced to make a comeback to the performance stage for a benefit concert.

name: Bandit Queen
summary_text: The story of the bandit queen Phoolan Devi who was sent to prison in 1983 and got free in 1994.

name: Supremacy
summary_text: A just paroled white neo-nazi and his ruthless girlfriend kill a cop and take an African-American family hostage. Meanwhile the supremacist leader who oversees his criminal empire from behind bars, is not happy. Inspired by real events.

name: With Fire and Sword
summary_text: An epic story about the Ukrainian uprising against the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth magnates in the 17th Century.

name: The Herd
summary_text: Because of a local blood feud, a peasant family in eastern Turkey decides to sell its sheep in far away Ankara.

name: Dark Country
summary_text: A couple en route from Las Vegas are forced to deal with a body out in the desert making their honeymoon one hellish ride.

name: Psy
summary_text: In the good old days Franz Maurer and his partners from the secret police used to live like kings. Now, they all must adapt to a new post-communist environment where they are scorned and ...                See full summary »

name: Medea
summary_text: After his quest to retrieve the fabled Golden Fleece, Jason returns to Greece with the powerful sorceress, Medea. However, when the king banishes her, it's only human that Medea plots her furious revenge. Can they escape her wrath?

name: The Cry of the Owl
summary_text: A troubled young man retreats from the big city and his ex-wife for the tranquility of a small town. He is drawn into a relationship with a young woman whose boyfriend goes missing, leaving the new arrival as a suspect.

name: The Red Maple Leaf
summary_text: A detective, who is deeply grieving over the tragic loss of his wife and daughter, becomes determined to find the kidnapped daughter of the U.S. Ambassador, no matter what the cost.

name: Status Update
summary_text: After teenager Kyle Moore is uprooted by his parents' separation, he's unable to fit into his new hometown. Then he stumbles upon a magical app that causes his social media updates to come true, which changes his entire life.

name: Le Silence de la Mer
summary_text: 1941 in a small town in Nazi occupied France. Against the will of its elderly male and his adult niece residents, the Nazis commandeer a house for one of their officers, Lt. Werner von ...                See full summary »

name: Triple Dog
summary_text: On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.

name: The Child in Time
summary_text: The life of a children's book author is turned upside down when his daughter goes missing.

name: Minotaur
summary_text: Long ago in the Iron Age, a shadow loomed over a lonely village. For generations, the village youths were stolen from their families and delivered as sacrifice to a mythical beast - the ...                See full summary »

name: Ortadirek Saban
summary_text: Saban is in the struggle against Erkan who is the sportman to be boyfriend of Adnan Bicakci's niece.

name: Jolene
summary_text: A teenage orphan spends ten years traveling cross-country experiencing life, love and heartbreak. Based on E.L. Doctorow's story, "Jolene: A Life."

name: Me Without You
summary_text: Two best friends grow up on the Isle of Wight and in Brighton in the 1970s and 1980s.

name: L'armata Brancaleone
summary_text: A group of misfits, headed by an incompetent knight named Brancaleone, set out to reach the small town of Aurocastro so that their leader can take possession of the fief.

name: Leningrad
summary_text: Winter, 1941. World War II rages on as Nazi troops invade the Soviet Union and besiege the devastated city of Leningrad. Foreign journalists are quickly evacuated, but in the chaos that ensues, Kate Davies is left behind.

name: Heavy
summary_text: The life of an overweight, unhappy cook is changed after a kind, beautiful college drop-out comes to work as a waitress at his and his mother's road-side restaurant.

name: True Believer
summary_text: A cynical former civil liberties attorney now reduced to "specializing" in defending drug dealers becomes transformed by an eight-year-old murder case.

name: Manta, Manta
summary_text: Proud German owners of Opel Manta's race the streets against VW's and Mercedes. They decide to set up a real race with lots of money involved.

name: The Man Who Loved Yngve
summary_text: A teenage boy loses his footing when he finds himself drawn to the new boy in class.

name: This Is Your Death
summary_text: An unsettling look at reality T.V. where a disturbing hit game show has its contestants ending their lives for the public's enjoyment.

name: The Incredible Shrinking Woman
summary_text: A housewife grows smaller and smaller in reaction to chemicals found in cosmetics and household products.

name: Ghoulies II
summary_text: The Ghoulies wreak havoc at an amusement park, disposing of those who mistake them for mere fairground attractions.

name: Dark Moon Rising
summary_text: A group of shape-shifting werewolves descend upon a small town in search of a girl who is re-born once every 2000 years. She holds the key to their survival and all will die who stand in their way.

name: Asylum Blackout
summary_text: A group of cooks at an asylum for the criminally insane get locked in with the inmates during a massive thunderstorm.

name: Ode to My Father
summary_text: Amid the time of Korean War, a young boy's vow to take care of his family marked the beginning of a lifelong promise spanning 60 years.

name: Love Affair
summary_text: Ex-football star Mike Gambril meets Terry McKay on a flight to Sydney, which is forced to land on a small atoll. Both engaged to others, they become romantic on board the ship sent to take ...                See full summary »

name: Breezy
summary_text: A young girl tries to find her way in life, suffering from her own naivety and sincerity.

name: Shiqi sui de dan che
summary_text: A seventeen-year-old country boy working in Beijing as a courier has his bicycle stolen, and finds it with a schoolboy his age.

name: Quicksilver
summary_text: Jack was doing great trading shares until he wasn't. He gets a job on a bike at Quicksilver speed delivery. There he befriends Hector and the cute Terri. Jack gets an enemy in the criminal Gypsy.

name: The Crew
summary_text: Work-life balance breaks down for Paris's most gifted armed robbers when a grave mistake forces them to work for a crime boss in a high-stakes heist.

name: The Tall Guy
summary_text: A nasty comedian's assistant has allergy induced sneezes, giving problems at work, et cetera. He accepts weekly injections after seeing the cute nurse. After a dozen injections, he finally asks her out.

name: Terror of Mechagodzilla
summary_text: Attempts to salvage Mechagodzilla are thwarted by a new monster, causing an Interpol investigation that uncovers the work of a shunned biologist and his daughter, who's life is entwined with the resurrected Mechagodzilla.

name: Benji
summary_text: A stray dog saves two kidnapped children.

name: Aziz Ansari: Right Now
summary_text: Aziz Ansari shares deep personal insights and hilarious takes on wokeness, family and the social climate.

name: Annie Get Your Gun
summary_text: The story of the great sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rose to fame while dealing with her love/professional rival, Frank Butler.

name: Sinbad: The Fifth Voyage
summary_text: When the Sultan's firstborn is taken by an evil sorcerer, Sinbad is tasked with travelling to a desert of magic and creatures to save her.

name: Saturn in Opposition
summary_text: The confidences, hopes and disappointments of a group of friends.

name: Slugs
summary_text: Killer slugs on the rampage in a rural community.

name: The Mercenary
summary_text: A greedy Polish mercenary aids a mine worker and peasant girl as they lead a revolution against the oppressive Mexican Government, and are pursued by an American rival.

name: Frankenstein Created Woman
summary_text: After being reanimated, Baron Frankenstein transfers the soul of an executed young man into the body of his lover, prompting her to kill the men who wronged them.

name: Computer Chess
summary_text: A 1980s-set story centered around a man vs. machine chess tournament.

name: Salvation Boulevard
summary_text: Set in the world of mega-churches in which a former Deadhead-turned-born again-Christian finds himself on the run from fundamentalist members of his mega-church who will do anything to protect their larger-than-life pastor.

name: Wagon Master
summary_text: Two young drifters guide a Mormon wagon train to the San Juan Valley and encounter cutthroats, Indians, geography, and moral challenges on the journey.

name: Indul a bakterház
summary_text: Story of a mischievous outspoken kid in a small Hungarian town.

name: Monster Man
summary_text: Two guys and a female hitchhiker are terrorized by a monstrous looking man driving a giant monster truck.

name: Sobibor
summary_text: Soviet officer Alexander Pechersky organizes a revolt and mass escape of prisoners from Sobibór extermination camp in October 1943.

name: Stage Fright
summary_text: A snobby musical theater camp is terrorized by a blood-thirsty killer who hates musical theater.

name: Poms
summary_text: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheer leading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'

name: Phata Poster Nikhla Hero
summary_text: Vishwas Rao is raised by his mother who wants him to become a police officer while he wants to become an actor.

name: Concussion
summary_text: After a blow to the head, Abby decides she can't do it anymore. Her life just can't be only about the house, the kids and the wife. She needs more: she needs to be Eleanor.

name: Straight A's
summary_text: Pressured by his deceased mother's ghost to return home to the family he abandoned, a former addict grabs a bag of pills and a sack of marijuana and hits the road to Louisiana.

name: I Am Dragon
summary_text: In the midst of the wedding princess Miroslava is kidnapped by a dragon and carried away into his castle on the remote island.

name: Torment
summary_text: Paul, an irritable and stressed-out hotel manager, begins to gradually develop paranoid delusions about his wife's infidelity. As he succumbs to green-eyed jealousy, his life starts to ...                See full summary »

name: Buddy Buddy
summary_text: During a high profile Mafia testimony case in California's Riverside County, a hired killer checks into a hotel room near the courthouse, while his depressed next-door neighbor wants to commit suicide due to marital problems.

name: Live from Baghdad
summary_text: CNN producer Robert Wiener, his colleague and their crew venture to the Iraqi capital to cover the Gulf War.

name: Afterschool
summary_text: An Internet-addicted prep-school student captures on video camera the drug overdose of two girls.

name: Mom and Dad Save the World
summary_text: An alien Overlord plans to blow up the Earth but first, he snatches and proposes to marry an Earthman's wife.

name: Iron Mask
summary_text: Early 1700: Cartographer Jonathan Green (Jason Flemyng) from Viy (2014) is back to map the Russian Far East. He's forced on to China, where he confronts the Dragon Master et al. The iron masked Russian Czar escapes the Tower of London to a Russian ship.

name: Godzilla: City on the Edge of Battle
summary_text: Humanity's desperate battle to reclaim the Earth from Godzilla continues. The key to defeating the King of the Monsters may be Mechagodzilla, a robotic weapon thought to have been lost nearly 20,000 years ago.

name: Titli
summary_text: Titli, the youngest member of a car-jacking brotherhood wants to escape the family business. He and his wife form a pact to set free from their family roots. But is escape possible?

name: Secret Agents
summary_text: Moles threaten to foil a team of secret agents' plan.

name: Angels and Insects
summary_text: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.

name: Closing the Ring
summary_text: A young man searches for the proper owner of a ring that belonged to a U.S. World War II bomber gunner who crashed in Belfast, Northern Ireland on June 1, 1944.

name: The First Grader
summary_text: The story of an 84 year-old Kenyan villager and ex Mau Mau veteran who fights for his right to go to school for the first time to get the education he could never afford.

name: Shallow Ground
summary_text: A naked teenage boy covered in blood appears at a remote sheriff's station one year after the brutal unsolved murder of a local girl. Now Sheriff Jack Shepherd, guilt ridden over the girl's...                See full summary »

name: House of Angels
summary_text: A rural village is divided when an extraordinary couple move into a mansion.

name: Tonight You're Mine
summary_text: Two feuding rock stars get handcuffed together for 24 hours at a music festival where they are both due to perform.

name: Eyewitness
summary_text: A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story.

name: Il Grido
summary_text: A man wanders aimlessly, away from his town, away from the woman he loved, emotionally and socially inactive.

name: Izo
summary_text: An executed samurai takes an existential journey throughout time, space and eternity in search of bloody vengeance.

name: Ilo Ilo
summary_text: In 90s Singapore, the friendship between Filipino nursemaid Teresa and her young charge Jiale makes waves in a family, while the Asian recession hits the region.

name: The One and Only
summary_text: When handyman Niller comes to install Sus' new kitchen one day, their immediate crush is a sweet escape from both of their problematic relationships.

name: Hi, Mom!
summary_text: A Vietnam vet moves into an apartment and views in other people's windows across the street, meets one of the women, and discovers black theater.

name: Bloody Birthday
summary_text: Three children are born at the height of an eclipse of the sun. Ten years later, they begin to murder the people around them - even their family members.

name: DC's Legends of Tomorrow: Their Time Is Now
summary_text: The producers introduce audiences to the characters and concepts of "Legends of Tomorrow", the upcoming spin-off of superhero series "Arrow" and "The Flash".

name: Saint Ange
summary_text: In 1958, in the French Alps, a young servant, Anna Jurin, arrives at Saint Ange Orphanage to work with Helena while the orphans are moved to new families. Anna, who is secretly pregnant, ...                See full summary »

name: Kansas City
summary_text: A pair of kidnappings expose the complex power dynamics within the corrupt and unpredictable workings of 1930s Kansas City.

name: Damsel
summary_text: It's the Wild West, circa 1870. Samuel Alabaster, an affluent pioneer, ventures across the American frontier to marry the love of his life, Penelope. As his group traverses the west, the once-simple journey grows treacherous, blurring the lines between hero, villain and damsel.

name: Contracted: Phase II
summary_text: Riley searches for a cure to the virus that took over Samantha before it consumes him and the entire world.

name: Trilogia: To livadi pou dakryzei
summary_text: This is the first film of Theo Angelopoulos' trilogy. The story starts in 1919 with some greek refugees from Odessa arriving somewhere near Thessaloniki. Among these people are two small ...                See full summary »

name: The Return of Swamp Thing
summary_text: In this tongue-in-cheek sequel, the benevolent bog creature falls for the vegetarian, plant-loving daughter of the evil scientist who created him.

name: Oopiri
summary_text: Impressed by his carefree attitude, Vikram, a quadriplegic multi-billionaire, hires a convict out on parole as his caretaker. What follows is a string of life lessons they learn from each other.

name: Exit Humanity
summary_text: A young man's struggle to survive in the aftermath of a deadly undead outbreak during the American Civil War.

name: Tuesday, After Christmas
summary_text: Paul Hanganu loves two women. Adriana his wife and the mother of their daughter, the woman with whom he's shared the thrills of the past ten years, and Raluca the woman who has made him redefine himself. He has to leave one of them before Christmas.

name: The Jack Bull
summary_text: After being wrongfully denied justice, a horse trader seeks his own justice on a treacherous rancher.

name: Godzilla vs. Gigan
summary_text: A manga artist becomes suspicious of his employers when a garbled message is discovered on tape. As he forms a team to investigate, Godzilla and Anguirus begin their own plan of action.

name: Dream Lover
summary_text: A successful businessman tries to uncover what is wrong with his wife.

name: Suck
summary_text: A comedy centered on a rock 'n' roll band that will do anything to become famous.

name: Gandahar
summary_text: An evil force from a 1000 years in the future begins to destroy an idyllic paradise, where the citizens are in perfect harmony with nature.

name: The Bat
summary_text: A crazed killer known as "The Bat" is on the loose in a mansion full of people.

name: Kahlil Gibran's The Prophet
summary_text: Exiled artist and poet Mustafa embarks on a journey home with his housekeeper and her daughter; together the trio must evade the authorities who fear that the truth in Mustafa's words will incite rebellion.

name: Simon Killer
summary_text: A recent college graduate flees to Paris after a break-up, where his involvement with a prostitute begins to reveal a potentially dark recent past.

name: Death of Me
summary_text: A vacationing couple must discover the mystery behind a strange video that shows one of them killing the other.

name: Godzilla vs. SpaceGodzilla
summary_text: Godzilla is threatened by two new forces: Mogera - another UN built machine; and Space Godzilla - a beast spawned from Godzilla's particles in space.

name: Student Bodies
summary_text: A serial killer with his signature heavy breathing proceeds to systematically kill the students and teachers of Lamab high school.

name: All This, and Heaven Too
summary_text: A duchess' irrational behavior toward the governess of her children triggers tragic events that will change her family's lives forever.

name: Finding Steve McQueen
summary_text: In 1972, a gang of close-knit thieves from Youngstown, Ohio attempt to steal $30 million in illegal contributions and blackmail money from President Richard Nixon's secret fund.

name: Love's Labour's Lost
summary_text: An update of the classic Shakespeare story, director Kenneth Branagh shot the film like a classic 1930s musical. It tells the story of four best friends who swear off love.

name: One Piece: Stampede
summary_text: Pirates from around the world gather at the Pirates Expo to join the hunt for Gol D. Roger's lost treasure.

name: D.C. Cab
summary_text: The misadventures of a group of unfortunate but street-wise cabbies working for a Washington, D.C. decrepit taxicab company.

name: Baadshaho
summary_text: An Indian queen asks her bodyguard to steal back gold taken from her by the Indian government during The Emergency period in 1975.

name: Raja Rani
summary_text: John and Regina, who dislike each other, are forced to get married and lead troubled lives. However, things take a turn when the couple suffers a sudden tragedy.

name: Gekijouban Naruto: Buraddo purizun
summary_text: Naruto Uzumaki is framed and sent to an inescapable prison where he must escape by any means necessary.

name: Ellen DeGeneres: Relatable
summary_text: Comedian Ellen DeGeneres performs a live stand-up comedy set in Seattle.

name: The Tree
summary_text: After the death of her father, an 8-year-old girl becomes convinced that he is whispering to her through the leaves of the gargantuan tree that towers over her house.

name: Hansel and Gretel
summary_text: After meeting an mysterious girl on an dark stretch of road, a young salesman is invited to a beautiful house with bizarre secrets and no way to escape.

name: Blind Horizon
summary_text: At the hospital, Frank comes out of a coma with amnesia. The sheriff wants to know who shot him. Later Frank remembers that something's happening to the president. Who is Frank?

name: Disco Pigs
summary_text: Pig and Runt - born on the same day, in the same hospital, moments apart. Twins, all but by blood. Inseparable from birth, they are almost telepathic. They are also partners in crime, with ...                See full summary »

name: Anesthesia
summary_text: Multiple lives intersect in the aftermath of the violent mugging of a Columbia University philosophy professor.

name: Racer and the Jailbird
summary_text: Set against the background of a brutal crime gang in Brussels, a tragic love story between Gigi, a high-flying gangster, and Bibi, a young racing driver with very upper-class roots.

name: Shogun
summary_text: An English navigator becomes both pawn and player in the deadly political games in feudal Japan.

name: Operation Crossbow
summary_text: Allied agents attempt to infiltrate the Nazis' rocket research site.

name: Two Thousand Maniacs!
summary_text: Six people are lured into a small Deep South town for a Centennial celebration where the residents proceed to kill them one by one as revenge for the town's destruction during the Civil War.

name: Maskeli Besler: Irak
summary_text: A Turkish comedy film about an incompetent gang of criminals attempting to capture an oil installation in northern Iraq in order divert the oil to Turkey, which was the third highest-grossing Turkish film of 2007.

name: Twentynine Palms
summary_text: David, an independent photographer, and Katia, an unemployed woman, leave Los Angeles, en route to the southern California desert, where they search a natural set to use as a backdrop for a...                See full summary »

name: Ayirathil Oruvan
summary_text: Anitha, a government official, embarks on a journey to find Chandramouli, an archaeologist, who went to Vietnam to search for any existence of the prince of the Chola dynasty.

name: Jesse Stone: Night Passage
summary_text: In this prequel to 'Stone Cold,' Tom Selleck reprises his role as Jesse Stone, an L.A. cop who relocates to a small town only to find himself immersed in one mystery after the other.

name: A Shock to the System
summary_text: When you think you're at the top of the corporate ladder and then discover they have managed to pull that ladder away, sometimes you have to take it upon yourself to "level" the playing ...                See full summary »

name: The Trouble with Angels
summary_text: Two high-spirited young students at St. Francis Academy keep things hopping for the challenged Mother Superior and her staff of bewildered Sisters.

name: Lake Placid 3
summary_text: Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community.

name: C U Soon
summary_text: A software engineer, living in Kerala, is prompted by his family to look for his cousin's missing fiancee. As they stumble upon her video-based suicide note, he races against time to find her.

name: Mi nismo andjeli 2
summary_text: In this sequel of "We Are Not Angels", a highly successful Yugoslavian comedy, a former playboy must cope with his daughter's adolescence, as well as numerous boys that keep knocking at her...                See full summary »

name: I Dreamed of Africa
summary_text: A bored Italian socialite (Kim Basinger) abandons her jet-set lifestyle for the rigors and rewards of rural Kenya in this true story, based on the best-selling memoir by Kuki Gallmann. Directed by Hugh Hudson (Chariots of Fire).

name: Swing Shift
summary_text: A woman finds romance when she takes a job at an aircraft plant to help make ends meet after her husband goes off to war.

name: Thr3e
summary_text: Innocent lives hang on the whim of an elusive psychopathic murderer whose strange riddles and impossible timelines force three people into a mission to end the game before one or all of them die.

name: Supercross
summary_text: Faced with the suspicious death of their father, two brothers must motivate one another to get back on their bikes and take the Las Vegas Motocross Championships by storm.

name: At the Earth's Core
summary_text: A Victorian era scientist and his assistant take a test run in their Iron Mole drilling machine and end up in a strange underground labyrinth ruled by a species of giant telepathic bird and full of prehistoric monsters and cavemen.

name: The Good Heart
summary_text: A cantankerous but ailing bartender takes a kindly young homeless man in under his wing.

name: Motherhood
summary_text: In Manhattan, a mother of two preparing for her daughter's sixth birthday party has no idea of the challenges she's about to face in order to pull off the event.

name: Lovesong
summary_text: The relationship between two friends deepens during an impromptu road trip.

name: American Pop
summary_text: The story of four generations of a Russian Jewish immigrant family of musicians whose careers parallel the history of American popular music in the 20th century.

name: La leggenda di Al, John e Jack
summary_text: Al Caruso, John Gresco and Jack Amoruso are three gangsters working for the Genovese family. However, their efforts are more than headache-inducing, and when they are given one last chance:...                See full summary »

name: The Magic Flute
summary_text: A production of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's opera "The Magic Flute" is presented, this film which blurs the lines of it as a stage production - not only with aspects of the theater stage ...                See full summary »

name: Godzilla and Mothra: The Battle for Earth
summary_text: Japan is caught in the middle of a three way battle between Godzilla, the divine Mothra, and her dark counterpart Battra.

name: Clownhouse
summary_text: Just before Halloween, three young brothers alone in a big house are menaced by three escaped mental patients who have murdered some traveling circus clowns and taken their identities.

name: Dead Man's Curve
summary_text: Two college students kill their roommate and make it look like a suicide.

name: The Glass Bottom Boat
summary_text: After a series of misunderstandings, the head of an aerospace research laboratory begins to suspect his new girlfriend is a Russian spy.

name: The Hawks and the Sparrows
summary_text: Totò and his son Ninetto are drifting on a road in Italy, when they meet a speaking crow.

name: Love with the Proper Stranger
summary_text: A salesclerk at Macy's department store finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with a musician, who does not even remember her.

name: Léon Morin, Priest
summary_text: Set during occupied France, a faithless woman finds herself falling in love with a young priest.

name: Anuvahood
summary_text: Meet Kenneth. He thinks he's got the moves. He thinks he's got the swagger. He thinks he can spit bars. But in reality, he's a WASTEMAN!

name: Deal
summary_text: As an ex-gambler teaches a hot-shot college kid some things about playing cards, he finds himself pulled into the world series of poker, where his protégé is his toughest competition.

name: Klovn Forever
summary_text: Frank and Casper's friendship is put to a test, when Casper decides to leave Denmark to pursue a solo career in Los Angeles. Determined to win his best friend back Frank chooses to follow Casper ensuring an eventful trip.

name: Birdemic 2: The Resurrection
summary_text: A platoon of eagles and vultures attack Hollywood, California. Why did the eagles and vultures attack? Who will survive?

name: Vanya on 42nd Street
summary_text: New York actors rehearse Chekhov's "Uncle Vanya" in a dilapidated theatre.

name: Enter the Ninja
summary_text: After passing a ninja master test in Japan, Cole visits a war buddy in the Philippines. He helps him fight men, who want his buddy's plantation.

name: Breast Men
summary_text: A movie about two doctors who created breast implants as this follows them over the years. However, when success and money come their way, they separate and follow different paths.

name: Photograph
summary_text: A struggling street photographer in Mumbai, pressured to marry by his grandmother, convinces a shy stranger to pose as his fiancée. The pair develop a connection that transforms them in ways they could not expect.

name: Viking
summary_text: Kievan Rus, late 10th century. After the death of his father, the young Viking prince Vladimir of Novgorod is forced into exile across the frozen sea.

name: Gigantic
summary_text: Three friends from Hamburg spend one last night on the town before one of them leaves the city forever.

name: Luna
summary_text: While touring in Italy, a recently-widowed American opera singer has an incestuous relationship with her 15-year-old son to help him overcome his heroin addiction.

name: 10 timer til Paradis
summary_text: Dennis, a painfully shy 38-year-old bodybuilder who lives with his mother, sets off to Thailand in search of love.

name: The Special Relationship
summary_text: A dramatization that traces former UK prime minister Tony Blair's relationships with Bill Clinton and George W. Bush.
